item.title: Sino American Oil Co 10-K
item.description: Sino American Oil Co, which is in the Crude Petroleum & Natural Gas [1311] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 07, 2022 had 8434 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 177 instances 30 - 139 instances 2021 - 132 instances stock - 98 instances financial - 94 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
